setup_script_description: sets focus on the first radio button, and checks the  second radio button
specific_user_instruction: Starting at the 'Regular crust' radio button, navigate to the 'Deep dish' radio button.

testPlanStrings.openExampleInstruction: Activate the "Open test page" button, which opens the example to test in a new window and runs a script that
testPlanStrings.commandListPreface: Do this with each of the following commands or command sequences.
testPlanStrings.commandListSettingsPreface: If any settings are specified in parentheses, ensure the settings are active before executing the command or command sequence.
testPlanStrings.assertionResponseQuestion: Which statements are true about the response to

output_assertions.assertionStatement: Name of the radio button, 'Deep dish', is conveyed
output_assertions.assertionPhrase: convey name of the radio button, 'Deep dish'

output_assertions.assertionStatement: State of the radio button, 'checked', is conveyed
output_assertions.assertionPhrase: convey state of the radio button, 'checked'

output_assertions.assertionStatement: Position of the radio button, 2, is conveyed

output_assertions.assertionStatement: Number of radio buttons in the group, 3, is conveyed
